name: Wendigo Alpha
description: The greatest of the Wendigos, an apex predator that has consumed countless victims. Grows stronger with each kill and terrifies all who face it.

abilities.name: Ravenous Charge
abilities.description: Charges at an enemy, dealing damage and stunning all in path.

abilities.name: Consume
abilities.description: Devours a non-hero unit, instantly killing it and gaining stats.

abilities.name: Ice Wind
abilities.description: Releases a freezing wind that damages and slows enemies.

abilities.name: Eternal Hunger
abilities.description: Enters uncontrollable hunger, gaining massive stats but losing control.
